resources.string: Take care of your Finances and Mess Schedules in one place! Manually cancelling mess meals costs you time and money and usually results in wasted food. EaterGrad allows you to easily cancel meals up to 2 hours in advance directly from your phone!
Swipe left to inform us that you will have your meal at the Mess.
Swipe right to cancel and inform us that you won’t be available for a meal.
See all your expenses for the meals you’ve had till date.
We maintain a record of all your cancelled meals so that you never have to worry about a missed expense.
Sign out of the application. [Note that this also deletes meal history from your device.]

Currently, the meals are being served at the following prices:
Breakfast: ₹25
Lunch: ₹40
Dinner: ₹45
